:py:mod:`plan4dial.generate_files.custom_actions.utils`
=======================================================

.. py:module:: plan4dial.generate_files.custom_actions.utils

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Util functions that are useful in custom actions.

   Authors:
   - Rebecca De Venezia



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   plan4dial.generate_files.custom_actions.utils.map_assignment_update



.. py:function:: map_assignment_update(entity: str, assignment: str) -> Dict

   Given an entity and its assignment, returns the corresponding
   update.

   Args:
   - entity (str): The entity in the update.
   - assignment (str): The assignment that describes if/how the entity
   was found.

   Returns:
   - (Dict): The update that corresponds to the entity and assignment
   provided.
